name: Real Soccer 2010
synopsis: Real Soccer, the #1 soccer game on Nintendo DSiWare, is back for the most exciting season yet! Choose from even more teams: over 245 clubs in 8 leagues and almost all players. Plus 3 new stadiums: Bavaria, RÃ©publique and Catedral. Perform flip-flaps, stepovers, etc. with the convenient touchscreen controls. TV commentary adds to the realism. Take photos to customize the ball, flag or even players and challenge friends wirelessly to tournaments.
